name: linkedin-sales-navigator-integration
description: Chrome extension for LinkedIn Sales Navigator integration with Highperformr.ai

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run copy-files && npm run zip
scripts.copy-files: mkdir -p dist && cp manifest.json content.js content.css background.js popup.html popup.js README.md dist/ && echo 'Files copied to dist/'
scripts.dev: npm run lint && npm run copy-files && echo 'Extension built for development. Load the dist/ folder in Chrome.'
scripts.watch: npm run dev && echo 'Watching for changes... Press Ctrl+C to stop' && chokidar '*.js' '*.css' '*.html' '*.json' -c 'npm run lint && npm run copy-files && echo "Files updated at $(date)"'
scripts.package: npm run build && echo 'Extension packaged as linkedin-sales-nav-integration.zip'
scripts.load-dev: npm run dev && echo 'Load the dist/ folder in Chrome extensions page'

author: Highperformr.ai
